simulatorPath.description: The absolute path of your Xcode simulator directory containing the Simulator.app script. Leaving it empty will automatically select the path with xcode-select -p.

emulatorPath.description: The absolute path of your Android emulator directory containing the emulator script.

emulatorPathMac.description: The absolute path of the Android emulator directory on your Macbook containing the emulator script.

emulatorPathLinux.description: The absolute path of the Android emulator directory on your Linux containing the emulator script.

emulatorPathWindows.description: The absolute path of the Android emulator directory on your Windows containing the emulator script.

androidColdBoot.description: Show an option to cold boot android devices.

androidExtraBootArgs.description: Add extra boot args to the android emulator.

hasEditorTitleIcon.description: Show the emulator icon in the editor bar on the top right.
